web_snippets: CEO, USA Curling · An expert communicator and proven leader of people with ... Dean Gemmell's profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.
The Board of Directors of USA Curling has named Dean Gemmell as the new CEO of USA Curling. He had served as the USA Curling Interim CEO since November 1st.
We are pleased to announce the appointment of Dean Gemmell as the Interim CEO of USA Curling. Dean has been involved in all aspects of the sport.
